35 namespace Mutation {

37 
38 Nasa7Polynomial::Nasa7Polynomial(const Nasa7Polynomial &to_copy)
39 {
40  *this = to_copy;
41 }
42 
43 Nasa7Polynomial &Nasa7Polynomial::operator=(const Nasa7Polynomial &to_copy)
44 {
45  // Avoid self-assignment
46  if (&to_copy != this) {
47  for (int i = 0; i < m_nr+1; i++)
48  mp_tbounds[i] = to_copy.mp_tbounds[i];
49 
50  for (int i = 0; i < m_nr; ++i)
51  for (int j = 0; j < m_nc; ++j)
52  mp_coefficients[i][j] = to_copy.mp_coefficients[i][j];
53  }
54 
55  // Enable cascading assignment
56  return *this;
57 }
58 
59 void Nasa7Polynomial::cp(const double *const p_params, double &cp) const
60 {
61  int index = tRange(p_params[0]);
62 
63  cp = mp_coefficients[index][0] +
64  mp_coefficients[index][1] * p_params[0] +
65  mp_coefficients[index][2] * p_params[1] +
66  mp_coefficients[index][3] * p_params[2] +
67  mp_coefficients[index][4] * p_params[3];
68 }
69 
70 void Nasa7Polynomial::enthalpy(const double *const p_params, double &h) const
71 {
72  int index = tRange(p_params[0]);
73 
74  h = mp_coefficients[index][0] +
75  mp_coefficients[index][1] * p_params[1] +
76  mp_coefficients[index][2] * p_params[2] +
77  mp_coefficients[index][3] * p_params[3] +
78  mp_coefficients[index][4] * p_params[4] +
79  mp_coefficients[index][5] * p_params[5];
80 }
81 
82 void Nasa7Polynomial::entropy(const double *const p_params, double &s) const
83 {
84  int index = tRange(p_params[1]);
85 
86  s = mp_coefficients[index][0] * p_params[0] +
87  mp_coefficients[index][1] * p_params[1] +
88  mp_coefficients[index][2] * p_params[2] +
89  mp_coefficients[index][3] * p_params[3] +
90  mp_coefficients[index][4] * p_params[4] +
91  mp_coefficients[index][6];
92 }
93 
94 void Nasa7Polynomial::gibbs(const double *const p_params, double &g) const
95 {
96  int index = tRange(p_params[0]);
97 
98  g = mp_coefficients[index][0] * p_params[1] +
99  mp_coefficients[index][1] * p_params[2] +
100  mp_coefficients[index][2] * p_params[3] +
101  mp_coefficients[index][3] * p_params[4] +
102  mp_coefficients[index][4] * p_params[5] +
103  mp_coefficients[index][5] * p_params[6] -
104  mp_coefficients[index][6];
105 }
106 
107 void Nasa7Polynomial::computeParams(const double &T, double *const params,
108  const ThermoFunction func)
109 {
110  double T2, T3, T4;
111 
112  T2 = T*T;
113  T3 = T2*T;
114  T4 = T3*T;
115 
116  if (func == CP) {
117  params[0] = T;
118  params[1] = T2;
119  params[2] = T3;
120  params[3] = T4;
121  }
122 
123  if (func == ENTHALPY) {
124  params[0] = T;
125  params[1] = T*0.5;
126  params[2] = T2/3.0;
127  params[3] = T3*0.25;
128  params[4] = T4*0.2;
129  params[5] = 1.0/T;
130  }
131 
132  if (func == ENTROPY) {
133  params[0] = log(T);
134  params[1] = T;
135  params[2] = T2*0.5;
136  params[3] = T3/3.0;
137  params[4] = T4*0.25;
138  }
139 
140  if (func == GIBBS) {
141  params[0] = T;
142  params[1] = 1.0-log(T);
143  params[2] = -T/2.0;
144  params[3] = -T2/6.0;
145  params[4] = -T3/12.0;
146  params[5] = -T4/20.0;
147  params[6] = 1.0/T;
148  }
149 }
150 
151 std::istream &operator>>(istream &in, Nasa7Polynomial &n7)
152 {
153  // Read the first line and extract the temperature limits
154  char temp[100];
155  in.get(temp, 49);
156  in.get(temp, 10); n7.mp_tbounds[0] = atof(temp);
157  in.get(temp, 10); n7.mp_tbounds[2] = atof(temp);
158  in.get(temp, 10); n7.mp_tbounds[1] = atof(temp);
159  in.getline(temp, 100);
160 
161  // Second line
162  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
163  in.get(temp, 16);
164  n7.mp_coefficients[1][i] = atof(temp);
165  }
166  in.getline(temp, 100);
167 
168  // Third line
169  for (int i = 5; i < 7; ++i) {
170  in.get(temp, 16);
171  n7.mp_coefficients[1][i] = atof(temp);
172  }
173  for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
174  in.get(temp, 16);
175  n7.mp_coefficients[0][i] = atof(temp);
176  }
177  in.getline(temp, 100);
178 
179  // Fourth line
180  for (int i = 3; i < 7; ++i) {
181  in.get(temp, 16);
182  n7.mp_coefficients[0][i] = atof(temp);
183  }
184  in.getline(temp, 100);
185 
186  return in;
187 }
